hrpy
====

*hr* but in python

--------------

USAGE
-----

::

       ~$ hr [STRING]...

Every argument passed to the program gets multiplied across the length
of the terminal window

--------------

Example
-------

::

       ~$ hr - + -
       ------------------------------------- ...
       +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ...
       ------------------------------------- ...

--------------

The current use I have for this is to make log files less of a mess
